description: This is a CMake script used to locate and configure the GStreamer Video 1.0 library within a build system. It checks for the library's presence, sets necessary variables, and defines imported targets for use in the project.
calls: set_target_properties(GStreamerVideo::GStreamerVideo PROPERTIES IMPORTED_LINK_INTERFACE_LANGUAGES "C" IMPORTED_LOCATION "${GSTREAMER_VIDEO_LIBRARY}" INTERFACE_COMPILE_DEFINITIONS "GSTREAMER_VIDEO" INTERFACE_COMPILE_OPTIONS "${PC_GSTREAMER_VIDEO_CFLAGS_OTHER}" INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PC_GSTREAMER_VIDEO_INCLUDE_DIRS}" INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES "${PC_GSTREAMER_VIDEO_LIBRARIES}")
